testcase.name: ContextMenu > ContextMenu — structure & a11y > has no obvious a11y violations when opened
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — opening/closing > opens on right click (contextmenu) and focuses the first enabled item
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — opening/closing > opens on keyboard (Shift+F10) and closes with Escape, returning focus to trigger
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — opening/closing > closes on outside click
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — keyboard navigation > ArrowDown/ArrowUp roves focus across enabled items (skipping disabled)
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — keyboard navigation > Home focuses the first enabled item
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — keyboard navigation > typeahead focuses the first matching item label
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — selection semantics > clicking an item calls onSelect and closes
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — selection semantics > disabled item does not call onSelect
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — selection semantics > checkbox item uses role=menuitemcheckbox and toggles aria-checked
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — selection semantics > radio items use role=menuitemradio and update aria-checked within group
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — submenu primitives > opens submenu on mouse enter of sub trigger
ContextMenu > ContextMenu — submenu primitives > opens submenu with ArrowRight and closes with ArrowLeft (returning focus to sub trigger)
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — structure & a11y > has no obvious a11y violations when opened
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — opening/closing > opens on right click (contextmenu) and focuses the first enabled item
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — opening/closing > opens on keyboard (Shift+F10) and closes with Escape, returning focus to trigger
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — opening/closing > closes on outside click
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — keyboard navigation > ArrowDown/ArrowUp roves focus across enabled items (skipping disabled)
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — keyboard navigation > Home focuses the first enabled item
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — keyboard navigation > typeahead focuses the first matching item label
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — selection semantics > clicking an item calls onSelect and closes
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — selection semantics > disabled item does not call onSelect
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — selection semantics > checkbox item uses role=menuitemcheckbox and toggles aria-checked
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — selection semantics > radio items use role=menuitemradio and update aria-checked within group
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — submenu primitives > opens submenu on mouse enter of sub trigger
ContextMenu > ContextMenu (default trigger) — submenu primitives > opens submenu with ArrowRight and closes with ArrowLeft (returning focus to sub trigger)
